meanings.definition: A person who represents a brand or company in advertising or promotional materials.
meanings.sent1: The spokesmodel smiled brightly in the commercial.
meanings.sent2: The spokesmodel wore a beautiful dress for the photoshoot.
meanings.sent3: The spokesmodel made everyone laugh with their funny dance moves.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence on stage turned her into a spokesmodel for self-assurance.
meanings.sent5: The spokesmodel's charm captivated the audience instantly.

meanings.definition: To serve as a spokesperson or model for a particular product or brand.
meanings.sent1: She will spokesmodel the new perfume during the event.
meanings.sent2: He spokesmodels for the latest fashion line.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to spokesmodel the catnip as a joke.
meanings.sent4: His ability to spokesmodel the technology amazed everyone.
meanings.sent5: They will spokesmodel the eco-friendly initiative with passion.
